SEARCH
Module VetAppointmentPortal
Package com.vetportal.service

Class EmployeeService

java.lang.Object
com.vetportal.service.EmployeeService
public class EmployeeService extends Object
Service layer responsible for employee-related business logic.

Delegates database operations to the EmployeeDAO and wraps results in ServiceResponse objects to include status and error handling.

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      a service response containing the employee or an error

    • findEmployeesByAttributes

      public ServiceResponse<List<Employee>> findEmployeesByAttributes(Map<String,String> attributes)
      Finds all employees matching certain attributes.
      Parameters:
      attributes - a Map of Strings where the first string corresponds to the entity attribute and the second String corresponds to the value to filter by in the db
      Returns:
      a service response containing the filtered list of employees or an error

    • findEmployeesByRole

      public ServiceResponse<List<Employee>> findEmployeesByRole(Employee.Position role)
      Find employees by their role.
      Parameters:
      role - the role to filter by
      Returns:
      a service response containing employees with the specified role
